org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics

Class HistogramModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics.AbstractPixelStatisticsModel
      • org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics.HistogramModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, FeatureVectorProvider<MultidimensionalHistogram>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaskingHistogramModel

    public class HistogramModel
extends AbstractPixelStatisticsModel
implements FeatureVectorProvider<MultidimensionalHistogram>
    A multidimensional histogram calculated from image pixels (assumes image is in 0-1 range)
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
